body:
Adds `wt` "witty", a Qt-like C++ web framework for GUIs.

**Homepage:** http://www.webtoolkit.eu/wt
**GitHub Repo:** https://github.com/emweb/wt

@jkelling can you please report if the commands
  - [x] `spack install wt` and
  - [x] `spack install wt +mariadb +postgresql +sqlite`

succeed for you?

Both work for me, the second requires #4392, #4394
title: Package: Wt
